Plot: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.
Title: Wing Commander
Writer: Chris Roberts (characters), Chris Roberts (story), Kevin Droney (screen story), Kevin Droney (screenplay)
Actors: Freddie Prinze Jr., Saffron Burrows, Matthew Lillard, Tchéky Karyo
tomatoConsensus: The low budget may explain Wing Commander's cheesy special effects, but can't excuse the lame dialogue or the movie's obsessive reliance on sci-fi cliches.
